snippet.title: (GAME TRAILER) Spotless -The Cleaning Rogue Lite
snippet.description:
Clean, Clash, and Collect across the crummiest corners of this Single-Player Rogue-Lite. Spend your meager earnings wisely on both permanent and temporary upgrades, so that even the thriving haunts of cute and creepy creatures can’t stop you from cleaning until everything is Spotless! 

Available in July on the Steam Store!

We will have our first public demo on June 10, 2024, as a part of the Steam NextFest showcase.

Wishlist/Demo here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638610/Spotless/
